entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.4 Fix issue with settings.yml and icons
entry.content:
Bug fixes for settings.yml being reset Bug fix for book icons not displaying correctly

(For people that follow every update sorry for the spam)

What's Changed

  • Config fixes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1253

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.3...v0.24.4

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.5 reverse proxy fix and czech added
entry.content:
Czech language added Reverse proxy fix for non security mode User Friendly Merge File Selection (needs a translation but reverse proxy release is more urgent)

What's Changed

  • Add missing Turkish translation by @limonkufu in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1255
  • Czech translations by @Houba28 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1263
  • Amended typo: trailing space by @zallaevan in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1256
  • User Friendly Merge File Selection by @t71rs in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1204
  • Updated ReadMe Screenshot by @t71rs in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1272
  • Add in oauth scope environment variable to docker-compose example by @pcanham in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1265
  • cleanup html for reverse proxy by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1274
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1275

New Contributors

  • @limonkufu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1255
  • @Houba28 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1263
  • @zallaevan made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1256
  • @pcanham made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.4...v0.24.5

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.6 Alpine docker update
entry.content:
Hoping slower updates going forwards with extra features :)

Docker update to update alpine for security issues etc Reversion of Merge files fix to avoid file selection issues in other prompts

What's Changed

  • Revert "User Friendly Merge File Selection" by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1280
  • update alpine to v3.20.0 by @Zoey2936 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.5...v0.24.6
